definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°
very early in the morning/in the wee hours
morning newspaper/(in a newspaper's name) Morning Post
first rays of morning sun/first glimmer of dawn
rare as morning stars (idiom)/few and far between/sparse
lit. morning bell, evening drum, symbolizing monastic practice (idiom); fig. encouragement to study or progress
make your day's plan early in the morning (idiom)/early morning is the golden time of the day
pinyin: yi1 ri4 zhi1 ji4 zai4 yu2 chen2

definition: lit. evening drum, morning bell (idiom); fig. Buddhist monastic practice/the passage of time in a disciplined existence

sentences.english: Under the morning sun, a great happiness hovers in space.
sentences.chinese: 在晨日的照耀下，一股巨大的欢喜之情在空中翱翔。

sentences.english: I am in the morning hush, of Stronglehorn' jungle, green and lush.
sentences.chinese: 我是清幽安静的晨，弥漫在绿色幽盛的荆棘谷。

sentences.english: Do you have morning sickness again, madam?
Most women have some form of morning sickness caused by pregnancy hormones.(
sentences.chinese: 许多女性会有一些由孕激素引起的晨呕现象。

sentences.english: I am in the morning hush , of Strangletharn's jungle, green and lush.
sentences.chinese: 我是清幽安静的晨，弥漫在绿色的荆棘谷。

sentences.english: I am in the morning bush, of Stranglethorn's jungle, green and lush.
sentences.chinese: 我是万籁俱寂的晨，弥漫于绿色茂盛的幽谷。
早早开始，一日之计在于晨。

sentences.english: until one morning Gary shoots a bird that's chirping outside the window.
sentences.chinese: 次日晨，盖瑞举枪射杀了一只在窗外啁啾的小鸟。

sentences.english: There is nothing but an old book in the box.
sentences.chinese: 箱子晨除了一本旧书外别无他物。

sentences.english: Cantabile, nearly in the morning cries, simply but decisively.
sentences.chinese: 如歌，近于晨的呼喊，干脆而又果决。

sentences.english: This is the early morning which the people said spits, many when early morning or empty stomach occurs.
sentences.chinese: 这就是人们所说的晨吐，多在清晨或空腹时发生。

sentences.english: Of day is morning, the morning is the best time for reading.
sentences.chinese: 一日之计在于晨，早晨是诵读的最佳时间。

sentences.english: The childhood shows the man, as morning shows the day. ----John Milton.
sentences.chinese: 人的一生在于童年就如一天之计在于晨。

sentences.english: Elizabeth Kaledin's The Morning Sickness Companion is a book by and for women suffering morning sickness.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白卡列金的晨吐伴侣是书，而女性的痛苦晨吐。
